title.description: An eyecatching title between 10-15 words that captures the essence of the news story

summary.description: A short, 1-paragraph TL;DR that summarizes the key points of the news story in 2-3 sentences

article.description:
The complete news article with 3-5 well-structured paragraphs in HTML format. Use

tags for paragraphs and tags for links. If a company link is available, link the company name on first mention.

image_prompt.description: A simple, visual 5-10 word phrase describing a scene that could be used to generate an accompanying image for the article
